00421 
00422     /* 
00423      * Returns C++ this pointer from table in stack at specified position.
00424      * C++ this pointer is set to index [0] of the table.
00425      * If [0] is not this pointer, then the table has no C++ counterpart.
00426      * Used by implementation.
00427      * @exception LuaException
00428      */
00429     static LuaTable* getThisPtr( lua_State* impl, int index );
00430 
00431     /*
00432      * Used by the implementation of Lua call dispatch system.
00433      */
